GET /api/review/:review_id.description: Provides a single review object that corresponds to the provided review_id

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: Provides an array of all the comments relating to a specific review

GET /api/users.description: Provides an array of all users

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: Allows a post request to made with a request body containing body and username that creates a new comment and adds it to the comments table, this responds with the newly created comment object

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: Provides an array of all the comments relating to a specific review

DELETE /api/comments/comment_id.description: Deletes the specified comment from the database
